test.sql: SELECT e.EmployeeID, ( SELECT et.TerritoryID FROM EmployeeTerritories et WHERE et.EmployeeID = e.EmployeeID ) FROM Employees e
test.expectedRuntimeError: Subquery returned more than 1 value. This is not permitted when the subquery follows =, !=, <, <= , >, >= or when the subquery is used as an expression.
